sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The Sys.GetUserName function is used to determine the name of the current user. It returns “Unknown” if a name could not be determined.
sections.mdown_content: The **Sys.GetUserName **function is used to determine the name of the current user. It returns Unknown if a name could not be determined.

sections.title: Example
code:
var computerName, userName : string
        computerName := Sys.GetComputerName
        userName := Sys.GetUserName
        put "Hello ", userName, " on ", computerName
sections.raw_content: This program outputs a greeting to the user .
sections.mdown_content: This program outputs a greeting to the user .

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Sys.GetUserName, not by calling GetUserName.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **Sys.GetUserName**, not by calling** GetUserName**.

sections.title: See also
sections.raw_content: Sys.GetComputerName to obtain the name of the computer.
sections.mdown_content: **[sys_getcomputername.html](Sys.GetComputerName)** to obtain the name of the computer.
